FuncDef: This command remarks both customer traffic and egress network IP interface traffic; VPRN customer traffic is not remarked. The remarking is based on the forwarding class to DSCP and LSP EXP bit mapping defined under the egress node of the network QoS policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that all IP routed traffic egressing the associated network interface will have its EXP, DSCP, P-bit, and DE bit setting remarked as defined in the associated QoS policy. Only bit fields configured in the QoS policy will be remarked; all others will be left untouched or set based on the default if the fields were not present at ingress.

ExtraInfo: Default: no remarking - Remarking disabled in the Network QoS policy.
